scripts.prepare-pack: copy README.md dist\nextech-ai-scribe-sdk\ && node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const distPkg = { ...pkg, files: ['README.md', 'package.json', 'index.d.ts', 'public-api.d.ts', 'fesm2022/**/*', 'esm2022/**/*', 'lib/**/*'], main: './fesm2022/nextech-ai-scribe-sdk.mjs', module: './fesm2022/nextech-ai-scribe-sdk.mjs', typings: './index.d.ts', exports: { '.': { types: './index.d.ts', esm2022: './esm2022/nextech-ai-scribe-sdk.mjs', default: './fesm2022/nextech-ai-scribe-sdk.mjs' } } }; delete distPkg.devDependencies; delete distPkg.scripts; require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist/nextech-ai-scribe-sdk/package.json', JSON.stringify(distPkg, null, 2));"
scripts.pack: npm run prepare-pack && cd dist/nextech-ai-scribe-sdk && npm pack
